items.sentence: Tom never opens his mouth without complaining about something.
I don\'t think I should tell Tom that I\'m going to Australia.
Should we tell Tom he doesn\'t need to be at today\'s meeting?
Tom has been racking his brains for a solution to the problem.
Tom has had trouble with his left eye ever since the accident.
Tom might want to consider giving Mary the loan she asked for.
Tom didn\'t quite understand why everybody was looking at him.
Tom didn\'t realize how important it was to be at the meeting.
Tom doesn\'t care how much it costs. He still plans to buy it.
Tom doesn\'t feed his dog in the morning, only in the evening.
